plot: Set deep in a moonlit forest, Time Before the Light is a story about two creatures from different worlds who discover that true beauty lies within.
title: Time Before the Light
plot_es: Set deep in a moonlit forest, Time Before the Light is a story about two creatures from different worlds who discover that true beauty lies within.
